title: JavaScript Quiz
description: Following quiz provides Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) related to Javascript Framework. You will have to read all the given answers and click over the correct answer.
browserTitle: Comic Books: Fact or Fiction Quiz

questions.question: What is the HTML tag under which one can write the JavaScript code?
questions.explanation: If we want to write a JavaScript code under HTML tag, you will have to use the “script” tag.

questions.question: Which of the following is the correct syntax to display “GeeksforGeeks” in an alert box using JavaScript?
questions.explanation: To display any text in the alert box, you need to write it as alert(“GeeksforGeeks”);.

questions.question: What is the correct syntax for referring to an external script called “geek.js”?
questions.explanation: The “src” term is used to refer to any JavaScript file.

questions.question: The external JavaScript file must contain <script> tag. True or False?
questions.explanation: It is not necessary for any external javascript file to have <script> tag.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a reserved word in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: In JavaScript, interface, throws and short are reserved keywords.

questions.question: In JavaScript, interface, throws and short are reserved keywords.
questions.explanation: In JavaScript, function is defined as ‘function x()’.
